RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH:
Professor da Faculdade de Direito da Universidade de Syracuse, onde ensina Direito Processual Civil, Class Actions, Direito Comparado e Responsabilidade Civil. Professor Colabolador no PPGD da UFBA.

Graduado em Direito pela UFBA (1990), mestre e doutor pela PUC-SP (1993 e 2003), doutor pela University of Pennsylvania Law School, Filadlfia, S.J.D (2001).

Foi Visiting Scholar nas Faculdades de Direito da Universidade de Milo (1994-1996), Pantheon Sorbonne (veres de 2000 e 2001) e Pensilvnia (1996-1997).

Foi Professor Visitante nas Faculdades de Direito ITAM (Mxico) em 2009 e 2020 e de Ghent (Blgica) em 2011, onde foi titular da Cadeira Marcel Storme. Ensinou tambm na Faculdade de Direito da Pensilvnia entre 1997 e 2003.

Pesquisa nas reas de Direito Processual Civil e Aes Coletivas. www.gidi.com.br
RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH-EN:
Teaching Professor at Syracuse University College of Law, where he teaches Civil Procedure, Class Actions, Comparative Law, and Torts.

Has been a Visiting Professor at Federal University of Bahia since 2016.

Graduated in Law from Federal University of Bahia (1990), Master's and Doctorate from PUC Sao Paulo (1993 and 2003), doctorate from University of Pennsylvania Law School, Philadelphia, S.J.D (2001).

Was Visiting Scholar in the following Law Schools: Milan (1994-1996), Pantheon Sorbonne (summers of 2000 and 2001) and Pennsylvania (1996-1997).

Was Visiting Professor at ITAM Law School (Mexico) in 2009 and 2020 and Ghent Law School (Belgium) in 2011, where he held the Marcel Storme Chair. Taught from 1997 to 2003 at University of Pennsylvania Law School.

Researches in the areas of Civil Procedure and Class Actions. www.gidi.com.br
